items.title: What’s your favorite sandwich to eat while watching a Notre Dame Football game?
items.summary: I know what you’re thinking… here comes some more PEAK Notre Dame Football off-season content, but even if you’re right, there’s a better reason we’re here. I have something to share. I don’t quite remember if this is something I have already talked about on the podcast, but after watching this insanely good video about […]

items.title: Which Notre Dame Football newcomer are you most excited to see this spring?
items.summary: With 37 new players scheduled to be on the Notre Dame Football roster in 2026, this Fighting Irish football team is going to feel its impact this spring with most of those 37 joining them on the practice field. While we don’t expect a ton of practice viewing to be allowed this spring, it will […]
